question: Personal development -agree or disagree..personal development is the base for professional development and advancing in once carrier. To what extend do you agree or disagree
text: Personal evolution and professional development are interrelated to each other. Personal Development is essential for professional growth in every field. I firmly agree with this statement. This essay intends to discuss the factors of both in the ensuing paragraphs.

To begin with, personal improvement is necessary for various types of jobs. Communication skills are expanding the personality. It is vital to winning the heart of the employees and bosses. For instance, the worker can be effortless with the companies through the communication skills in presentations. Apart from that social skills in also vital to improving professional life. Social skills help to build strong relationships with co-workers. Also, it inspires the people. For instance, patients get satisfaction and happiness if nurses give care with social and moral support to patients.

Another element is cooperative skills. It is vital for all job field workers. People have to do groundwork and demonstration with many kinds of people. Head can not get promoted workers on their academic knowledge and skills. They have assessed the peaceful and correlated nature. Last but not least, to get leadership in the field, people have to be enthusiastic, honest, and creative. It is not only based on experience and education.

On the other hand, a degree and hard work are necessary for progress and achievements. Numerous famous and successful people are educated and diligent in their work. They like to walk time without wasting a minute. Nevertheless, it is not enough to achieve goals. Other skills are necessary for the job.
To conclude, I reiterate my belief that a degree and hard work are needed to achieve a good job. Yet people can not achieve name and fame without personal skills.

error_list.error_des: The word in doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
